name: nuxt-firebase-pwa
description: Nuxt.js * Firebase = SPA * SSR * PWA * Serverless
author: Nickolay Trukhin <coolone.official@gmail.com> (http://coolone.ru), Shinnosuke Uwai <uydasan@gmail.com>

scripts.install: yarn copydeps:src && yarn install:functions && yarn install:src
